item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: AS220 BAR!

Okay, so we've hit the jackpot this week! Guess what!? There's a new event going on in Providence from June 14th-27th called BarPlays! And guess what else - the Opening Night Gala is at the AS220 bar which is normally closed on Mondays! There are 3 short plays beginning at 7, they're short which is good, that way we can socialize too. So come hang out, cheer on some local playwrights and actors, and let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing some kind of scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - AS220 and BarPlays!
